scripts.dev: concurrently --names server,client --prefix-colors blue,green "pnpm --filter server dev" "pnpm --filter client dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter server build && pnpm --filter client build
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter server run typecheck && pnpm --filter client run type-check
scripts.db:migrate: dotenv -e .env -- pnpm --filter server exec prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:generate: dotenv -e .env -- pnpm --filter server exec prisma generate
scripts.db:push: dotenv -e .env -- pnpm --filter server exec prisma db push
scripts.db:studio: dotenv -e .env -- pnpm --filter server exec prisma studio
